column1:
Is #China sending out infected persons throughout the world with this new corona virus ? 
That’s some serious tinfoil hat shit but with all the shit they have been pulling one does wonder

They are both a risk
Currently influenza is a higher risk bc it’s here 
Once the corona virus gets here it will be a much higher risk than flu!
We have some immunity to all flu viruses 
We have Zero immunity to the coronavirus
